Uses of Interface
matrix.distributionPolicy.TaskSplitPolicy

  • Packages that use TaskSplitPolicy 
    Package Description
    matrix.adapterDistribution  
    matrix.distributionPolicy  

    • Uses of TaskSplitPolicy in matrix.adapterDistribution

      Fields in matrix.adapterDistribution declared as TaskSplitPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TaskSplitPolicy Configuration.policy 

    • Uses of TaskSplitPolicy in matrix.distributionPolicy

      Classes in matrix.distributionPolicy that implement TaskSplitPolicy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  TaskSplitPolicyMode
      This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the mode sparseness of the rows and the number of physical cores.
      class  TaskSplitPolicyRowSparseness
      This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the average sparseness of the rows and the number of physical cores.
      class  TaskSplitPolicyST
      This class defines the PARALLEL_FACTOR based on the number of physical cores, and the average sparseness of the rows and its Standard Deviation.
      class  TaskSplitPolicyStatic
      This strategy is defined by a constant value equal to Configuration.CLUSTER_PHYSICAL_CORES * Configuration.GRANULARITY_FACTOR.
